response.overview: A tech worker with agoraphobia discovers recorded evidence of a violent crime but is met with resistance when she tries to report it. Seeking justice, she must do the thing she fears the most: leave her apartment.
response.tagline: She's not the only one listening.
response.title: Kimi

titles.title: KIMI サイバー・トラップ

crew.name: Jody Levin
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production

results.name: I Thought It Might Have Been a Crime
